name: Hole (dArk Studio)
description:
Hole is a Puzzle game, Its inspirated from Fancade (Martin Magni's Game) In Level named "Hole",

How to Play?

Its Easy! You only move the Hole with W/A/S/D or Arrows, and theres an 2 elements :

  • Good Element, Good element is an element you should put it into the Hole, if you put it, The Score is increased by 1. If Good Element is out, You Win! Note : Good Element is NOT COLORED RED
  • Bad Element. , Bad element is an element you should NOT put it into the Hole, if you put it, The Life is reduced by 1. If Life is out, You Lose! Note : Bad Element is COLORED RED
